title: Patch 7.3
body: I am having trouble installing the new patch 7.3. It goes to around 33-99% and in between but always comes up with the screen " an unexpected error has occurred" t This has been happening for 2 days and I have tried uninstalling the game reinstalling it, even using hextech repair as well, but yet I STILL having trouble downloading it. I have also tried running as administrator and all of the suggestions on how to solve it. anyone have an idea to help me out here? Its getting frustrating.

replies.body: Issues during patching **at or after 33%** are typically caused by an **unstable connection** to our patching servers. You should be able to resolve this by ensuring your network settings match what is listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If you continue to experience this issue after taking those steps, let me know.
